alert_text: If you're not ready to get your own Personal Axies, don't worry. Starter Axies are available for all players to start playing for free.
buying_axies_text: The Marketplace is where you can purchase Axies with a cryptocurrency called Ether (ETH). Let's learn how to create your wallet, add Ether and buy your first Axies!
buying_axies_data_txt_1: First, you'll need to create a Ronin Wallet. Your Ronin Wallet will store your crypto funds and NFT items – including Axies!
buying_axies_data_txt_11: Follow the steps in the official Axie Infinity Ronin Wallet tutorial to get set up.
buying_axies_data_txt_2: Next, you'll need to deposit some Ether (ETH) into your Ronin Wallet.
buying_axies_data_txt_22: You can either buy ETH on the Ronin network or transfer ETH from the Ethereum network:
buying_axies_data_txt_3: Visit the Official Axie Marketplace and pick out your Axies! Use the filters on the left to narrow down your search.
buying_axies_data_txt_4: Once you've purchased your 3 Axies, you'll need to sync them so that they appear in game.
buying_axies_data_txt_41: Open the Axie Infinity game application (either on your computer or your phone), click Axies, then click Sync.

eth_data.title: Buy ETH

eth_data.title: Transfer ETH

alert_text_3: Think of your Ronin Wallet like a boarding pass to the digital Axie nation.

scholarship_title: Finding a Scholarship in the Community
scholarship_text: Scholarships enable new players to rent Axies from other players. This is great way to battle and earn with Personal Axies with no upfront cost. You can estimate your Scholarship earnings using the Scholarship Calculator.
scholarship_beginner_txt: Before looking for a Scholarship, it's important to understand the basics of a how a Scholarship works:

scholarship_data.title: Onboarding -
scholarship_data.text: A player with Axies (the Manager) decides to lend these Axies to another player (the Scholar).

scholarship_data.title: Revenue Sharing -
scholarship_data.text: The Manager sets the % split of earnings that will be shared with the Scholar.

scholarship_data.title: Earning -
scholarship_data.text: The Scholar battles with the Axies and earns in-game tokens called Smooth Love Potion (SLP).

scholarship_data.title: Payout -
scholarship_data.text: The Manager transfers the Scholar's % of SLP on a set schedule, typically every 2 weeks or once per month.

scholarship_data.title: Graduation -
scholarship_data.text: The Scholar can save some or all of her SLP and use it to purchase her own Axies. When this happens, we say that the Scholar has 'graduated' from the Scholarship.

rules_txt: Every scholarship will have its own rules set by the Manager, so be sure to ask about the rules before you apply.Here are a few basic questions to get you started:

rules_data.text: What is the Scholar's % share of SLP?
How often will the Scholar be paid out?
Is there a minimum amount of SLP that must be earned per day/week/month in order to keep the Scholarship?
Are there any other Rules of the Scholarship?

scholarship_txt_2: The most important rule that applies to every scholar is No Multi-Accounting. Multi-Accounting is when you play two or more different accounts on the same device. This will result in your Axies getting permanently banned.
scholarship_txt_3: Lastly, all players must adhere to the rules of Axie Infinity. Be sure to read and fully understand the Axie Infinity Terms of Use and the Axie Infinity Code of Conduct.
find_scho_txt: To find a Scholarship, you'll need to connect with a Manager or Guild within the Axie Infinity community.

faq_data.h4: Where do I get Personal Axies?
faq_data.p: Personal Axies can be obtained from the Marketplace.

faq_data.h4: What can I do with my Personal Axies?
faq_data.p: Personal Axies can be used to battle in Adventure Mode and Arena Mode. They are also able to breed and can be traded with other players on the Marketplace.

faq_data.h4: What’s the difference between Personal Axies and Starter Axies?
faq_data.p: Personal Axies are your own unique NFTs (Non-Fugible Tokens) that live on the blockchain. They are able to breed, can be traded and can be upgraded further than Starter Axies. While Starter Axies are unlocked in-game, if you want to obtain Personal Axies, you'll need to visit the Marketplace.
